default.message_nonWin:
NOT A WINNER.
BETTER LUCK NEXT TIME
default.message_tryWin:
THANKS FOR TRYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON
default.help_text:
Click/tap the prize box to reveal the game's prize. Click/tap the bonus box to reveal the potential prize multiplier. Click/tap the question marks to reveal various ice cream treats.
Find three SUPER SUNDAES in any row, column, or diagonal, and win the game's prize-perhaps at 2, 3, or 4 times its value!
